data.prayer: Lord, make the 6,026 believers in Soriano to be brave and clear with the gospel to their 76,574 neighbors.
data.verse: So Paul and Barnabas spent considerable time there, speaking boldly for the Lord, who confirmed the message of his grace by enabling them to perform signs and wonders.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Soriano, Uruguay
data.section_summary: What beauty can God be thanked for in this photo?

data.prayer: Jesus, you said you were the giver of evangelists to the church. Please, send more evangelists to the state of Soriano, Uruguay.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.section_summary: On average, 11 babies will be born in the next 100 hours to families who are far from God in Soriano, Uruguay.
data.prayer: Spirit, reveal yourself to these new families.
Father, please send teachers of your Word in Soriano who can speak your gospel boldly and clearly.
Father, you gave the church of Soriano, Uruguay the greatest shepherd of all time, Jesus. Please, help them listen to him.
data.verse: I will place over them one shepherd, my servant David, and he will tend them; he will tend them and be their shepherd.

data.focus_label: Pray for the city of Villa Soriano
data.prayer: Pray that God raises up new churches in the city of Villa Soriano, Soriano, Uruguay.
Father, we suspect there is 1 believer for every 13 neighbors who are far from you in Soriano. Please, give courage and opportunity to your children to speak boldly.
data.verse: Pray also for me, that whenever I speak, words may be given me so that I will fearlessly make known the mystery of the gospel.

data.prayer: Father, please raise up every one you have called in Soriano, Uruguay to become worthy of their calling, and offer spiritual sacrifices acceptable to you through Jesus.
data.verse: I urge you to live a life worthy of the calling you have received

data.prayer: Father, help your children in Soriano, Uruguay find someone like the Samaritan Woman today. Someone who will open an entire town to your message of salvation.
data.verse: So the woman left her water jar and went away into town and said to the people, 29 “Come, see a man who told me all that I ever did. Can this be the Christ?” They went out of the town and were coming to him.

location.name: Soriano
location.cities_list: Mercedes, Dolores, Palmitas, José Enrique Rodó, Villa Soriano
location.cities_list_w_pop: Mercedes (42,359), Dolores (17,174), Palmitas (2,123), José Enrique Rodó (2,120), Villa Soriano (1,124)
